publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3540# Ms Sandra White: Exploitation of Women—That the Parliament notes with concern the increasing proliferation of lap-dancing clubs and other establishments of a similar nature throughout Scotland; further notes that the US-based firm Spearmint Rhino, reported to be linked with pornographic websites featuring the drugging, abduction and rape of women, has plans to expand its lap-dancing operations into Scotland; believes that these establishments encourage the exploitation of women and have no place in a modern Scotland seeking to promote equality and eradicate violence against women, and therefore considers that the Scottish Executive should monitor this situation closely and take whatever action is necessary to halt the spread of these establishments.
S1M-3540# Exploitation of Women (lodged on 5 November 2002) Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3540# Ms Sandra White: Exploitation of Women—That the Parliament notes with concern the increasing proliferation of lap-dancing clubs and other establishments of a similar nature throughout Scotland; further notes that the US-based firm Spearmint Rhino, reported to be linked with pornographic websites featuring the drugging, abduction and rape of women, has plans to expand its lap-dancing operations into Scotland; believes that these establishments encourage the exploitation of women and have no place in a modern Scotland seeking to promote equality and eradicate violence against women, and therefore considers that the Scottish Executive should monitor this situation closely and take whatever action is necessary to halt the spread of these establishments.Supported by: Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-3540# Exploitation of Women (lodged on 5 November 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3540# Exploitation of Women (lodged on 5 November 2002) Brian Adam*
S1M-3540# Exploitation of Women (lodged on 5 November 2002) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-3540# Exploitation of Women (lodged on 5 November 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-3540# Exploitation of Women (lodged on 5 November 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Elaine Smith*
S1M-3540# Exploitation of Women (lodged on 5 November 2002) Robin Harper*

S1M-3540# Ms Sandra White: Exploitation of Women—That the Parliament notes with concern the increasing proliferation of lap-dancing clubs and other establishments of a similar nature throughout Scotland; further notes that the US-based firm Spearmint Rhino, reported to be linked with pornographic websites featuring the drugging, abduction and rape of women, has plans to expand its lap-dancing operations into Scotland; believes that these establishments encourage the exploitation of women and have no place in a modern Scotland seeking to promote equality and eradicate violence against women, and therefore considers that the Scottish Executive should monitor this situation closely and take whatever action is necessary to halt the spread of these establishments. Supported by: Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Adam Ingram, Brian Adam, Pauline McNeill, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Jamie Stone, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Elaine Smith, Robin Harper
